Comment: I've heard about this move, but don't get it yet. I would have went to Qf4, and  took the bishop on the next move, and set up for Rf7 on the next. We'll see where black is going? ... No wait I see the problem with that, with the king out of f row Nd6 will fork the queen and king via white's queen. ... turns out I think d6 would have been better here. This move is actually completely pointless so far as I can see. (Although in retrospect things work out ok for black.)
